name: v2.3.5
body:
- Added createBond() and setPairingConfirmation() to BluetoothCentral
- Added methods to BluetoothPeripheralManager to get information about which centrals want indications or notifications

name: v2.3.4
body: - Add support for UINT48 in BluetoothBytesParser

name: v2.3.3
body: - Add method getBondState() to BluetoothCentral

name: v2.3.2
body: - Add workaround for bug on Android 13 where onPhyUpdate isn't called

name: v2.3.1
body: - Added method to only send notification to 1 Central

name: v2.3.0
body:
Make library Android 13 compatible

- Make use of Android 13 apis where needed and don't rely on deprecated apis/callbacks
- Introduce ReadResponse for PeripheralManager since characteristics cannot contain data anymore

name: v2.2.3
body: Fix issue where onConnectionStateChange will be called with a null value for bluetoothGatt

name: v2.2.2
body: Fix rare NPE crash when calling stopScan() when BLE is being turned on

name: v2.2.1
body: - Fix rare NPE crash when calling stopScan() when BLE is being turned off

name: v2.2.0
body:
- Added onCharacteristicWriteCompleted callback
- Added onDescriptorWriteCompleted callback

name: v2.1.6
body:
- Add setByteArray support in BluetoothBytesParser
- Refactoring

name: v2.1.5
body: Fix long read of descriptor when using BREDR transport. Now works for both LE and BREDR transports

name: v2.1.4
body: - Fix long read of characteristic when using BREDR transport. Now works for both LE and BREDR transports

name: v2.1.3
body: - Explicitly stop scans when startScan fails

name: v2.1.2
body: - Fixed another issue where scanning wouldn't work after toggling bluetooth

name: v2.1.1
body: - Fixed issue where scan wouldn't be stopped when toggling bluetooth quickly

name: v2.1.0
body:
Includes:

- Support for Android 12
- Add createBond() to BluetoothCentralManager
- Bug fix: sending indications when characteristic has both indicate and notify
- Updated Gradle to 7.0.2
- Updated Timber to 5.0.1
- Require BLE to be 'on' when issuing a connect
- Fix contour clock function to include DST

name: Version 2.0.11
body: - Improve bond lost scenario handling

name: Version 2.0.10
body: - Make the transport configurable, See #106

name: Version 2.0.9
body: - Pause queue when peripheral initiates bonding

name: Version 2.0.8
body:
- Refactoring of BluetoothBytesParser
- Added onConnectingPeripheral and onDisconnectingPeripheral callbacks

name: Version 2.0.7
body:
- Added functions disableLogging()/enableLogging() that will disable/enable all logging done by Blessed
- Updated build.gradle
- Updated README

name: Version 2.0.6
body:
- Updated location services check
- wait for SetPhy to finish before completing command

name: Version 2.0.5
body: - Deal with MTU also possibly being updated by peripheral

name: Version 2.0.4
body:
- Updated Robolectric & Mockito versions to the latest
- Refactored tests and improved coverage
- Minor code refactoring

name: Version 2.0.3
body: - Fix issue with PeripheralManager when using Kotlin

name: Version 2.0.2
body: - Code cleanup

name: Version 2.0.1
body:
- Got rid of unnecessary getters in the enum classes
- Added extra utility methods to BluetoothBytes parser
- Updated documentation

name: Version 2.0.0
body:
New major release:

- Added BluetoothPeripheralManager class so that you can make your own peripherals
- Added BluetoothCentral class to represent remote centrals. Only relevant if you make your own peripherals
- Replaced all int codes with enum classes

name: Version 1.47
body:
- Shortened Phy enumerations for readability.
- Updated documentation

name: Version 1.46
body: - Added support for setPreferredPhy() and readPhy()

name: Version 1.45
body:
- BREAKING CHANGE: renamed BluetoothCentral to BluetoothCentralManager to be consistent
- Minor refactoring

name: Version 1.44
body:
Happy new year!

- Minor refactoring

name: Version 1.43
body:
- Added getMaximumWriteValueLength() method
- Minor refactoring of gatt method precondition checks

name: Version 1.42
body: - Stop unnecessary byte copying in BluetoothGattCallback

name: Version 1.41
body:
- Fixed rare issue where readCharacteristic could cause queue to get stuck
- Minor refactoring

name: Version 1.40
body:
This release has BREAKING CHANGES.

New in this release:
- Introduction of HciStatus and GattStatus enum classes to replace the status int's that Android provides.
- Introduction of WriteType enum class to replace the Android int values
- Minor code refactoring
- Example app has been expanded to support Glucose meters

name: Version 1.30
body:
- Introduced convenience methods for read/write characteristic 
- Introduced BluetoothGattError and BluetoothError classes for improved error logging
- Extended demo app with support for Weight Scales and Pulse Oximeters
- Minor refactoring

name: Version 1.29
body:
- Improved nullability checks
- More checks on validity of function parameters

name: Version 1.28
body:
- Fix rare NPE when starting service discovery 
- Added currentMtu variable so that you can always access the current mtu

name: Version 1.27
body: Implemented BluetoothPeripheral caching to reduce memory footprint while scanning

name: Version 1.26
body:
- Fixed NPE
- Added scanForPeripheralsUsingFilters method
- Improved function argument checking

name: Version 1.25
body: - More nullability improvements

name: Version 1.24
body: - Some refactoring done

name: Version 1.23
body:
- Add @NotNull annotations so that Kotlin correctly deals with method arguments
- Enforce @NotNull checks

name: Version 1.22
body: Fix issue that when autoConnecting by scanning and then cancelling the connection, the peripheral would remain in unconnectedPeripherals

name: Version 1.21
body: - Fixes bug where the state would remain DISCONNECTION when doing a cancelConnection on an autoconnected peripheral

name: Version 1.20
body: - Exposed a new method isBluetoothEnabled()

name: Version 1.19
body: - Refactoring code and improved stability

name: Version 1.18
body: - Make sure pairing dialog does not appear when programmatically pairing

name: Version 1.17
body: - Make sure UI doesn't appear when programmatically issuing PIN code

name: Version 1.16
body: - Added functionality to automatically issue PIN codes if the PIN code is fixed

name: Version 1.15
body: - Small refactoring to get rid of occasional error

name: Version 1.14
body: Fix crash on some phones when turning off bluetooth

name: Version 1.13
body: Fixed bug in autoConnectPeripheralsBatch

name: Version 1.12
body: Change signature of autoConnectPeripheralsBatch to take a map of peripherals and callbacks

name: Version 1.11
body:
- Some code refactoring to improve stability and maintenance
- Added autoConnectPeripheralsBatch method to safely connect to several peripherals in one go 
- Minor changes to what gets logged

name: Version 1.10
body: Reduced number of Handlers and made sure all Bluetooth operations are done on the main thread

name: Version 1.9
body: Make sure all Handlers are running on the main thread

name: Version 1.7
body:
- Fixed issue with retry mechanism
- Added close() method to clean up resources when needed

name: Version 1.6
body: Fixed rare crash and did some refactoring

name: Version 1.5
body: Fixed autoConnect issue

name: Version 1.4
body:
- Added new method isScanning to check is we are currently scanning
- Added better logging for scanning failures
- Added all scanning error codes

name: Version 1.3
body: Small fixes

name: Version 1.2
body: Send bluetooth adapter state changes to BluetoothCentralCallback

name: Version 1.1
body: Refactored BluetoothBytesParser and added more functions

name: Version 1.0
body: Enough mileage on this library to declare 1.0!

name: Version 0.14
body: Added extra checks in requestConnectionPriority

name: Version 0.13
body: Exposed requestConnectionPriority

name: Version 0.12
body: Make behavior consistent across devices when turning off bluetoot

name: Version 0.11
body: - Adjusted permission checks to Android 10 where ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION is needed for scanning

name: Version 0.10
body:
- Switched to Timber for logging
- Added more tests

name: Version 0.9
body: Bug fixes

name: Version 0.8
body: Improved thread safety

name: Version 0.7
body:
- Updated BluetoothPeripheralCallback interface with extra status fields
- Allow connection attempts to uncached peripherals

name: Version 0.6
body:
Added:

- Added support for Android 5 (minSdk 21)
- Minor tweaks

name: Version 0.5
body:
Added:
- Added pairing popup hack
- Distinguish between timeouts and connection errors. Only retry connection errors

name: Version 0.4
body: Scanning fixes

name: Version 0.3
body: Added support for manual bonding

name: First release
body: First release of the BLESSED library and test app
